alert.note: Alert for Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 3:50PM MDT until August 18 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Meagher County in central Montana... * Until 430 PM MDT. * At 349 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 40 miles northeast of Townsend to near White Sulphur Springs to 27 miles northeast of Toston, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... White Sulphur Springs, Fort Logan On The Smith River, Newlan Creek Reservoir, Lennep, Martinsdale, Checkerboard and Fort Logan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
